meanings.definition: Covered with straw or a similar material
meanings.sent1: The quaint cottage had a thatched roof.
meanings.sent2: The old barn had a thatched roof to protect it from the rain.
meanings.sent3: The thatched roof on the house made it look like a cozy nest.
meanings.sent4: The thatched roof swayed gently in the breeze, like a golden sea.
meanings.sent5: The thatched roof added a rustic charm to the building.

meanings.sent1: The artisan crafted a beautiful thatched basket.
meanings.sent2: The chair was made of thatched material for a natural look.
meanings.sent3: The thatched hat looked like a miniature roof on his head.
meanings.sent4: Her thatched skirt rustled softly as she walked through the field.
meanings.sent5: The thatched walls of the hut provided excellent insulation.
